entry.title: Notes on Lebesgue integration
entry.summary: Alternative approaches to Lebesgue integration are considered.

entry.title: Distances between composition operators
entry.summary: The norm distance between two composition operators is calculated in select cases.

entry.title: On a class of $C^*$ preduals of $l_1$
entry.summary: Some nice preduals of $l_1$ are presented

entry.title: A proof of Rosenthal's \(\ell_1\) Theorem
entry.summary: A proof is given of Rosenthal's \(\ell_1\) theorem.

entry.title: Uniqueness sets for Fourier series
entry.summary: The paper discusses some uniqueness sets for Fourier series.

entry.title: Banach space valued mean periodic functions
entry.summary: Here we give a necessary and sufficient condition for a Banach space to be separable.

entry.title: Fractional Hardy-Sobolev-Maz'ya inequality on balls and halfspaces
entry.summary: We prove fractional Hardy--Sobolev--Maz'ya inequality for balls and a half-space, partially answering the open problem posed by Frank and Seiringer [arXiv:0906.1561v1 [math.FA], 2009] We note that for half-spaces this inequality has been recently obtained by Sloane [arXiv:1004.4828v1 [math.FA], 2010].

entry.title: An arbitrarily distortable Banach space
entry.summary: In this work we construct a ``Tsirelson like Banach space'' which is arbitrarily distortable.

entry.title: A Gordon-Chevet type Inequality
entry.summary: We prove a new inequality for Gaussian processes, this inequality implies the Gordon-Chevet inequality. Some remarks on Gaussian proofs of Dvoretzky's theorem are given.

entry.title: Isomorphisms of certain weak L^p spaces
entry.summary: It is shown that the weak $L^p$ spaces $\ell^{p,\infty}, L^{p,\infty}[0,1]$, and $L^{p,\infty}[0,\infty)$ are isomorphic as Banach spaces.

entry.title: A Note on Unconditional Structures in Weak Hilbert Spaces
entry.summary: We prove that if a non-atomic separable Banach lattice in a weak Hilbert space, then it is lattice isomorphic to $L_2(0,1)$.

entry.title: The unconditional basic sequence problem
entry.summary: We construct a Banach space that does not contain any infinite unconditional basic sequence.

entry.title: A remark about distortion
entry.summary: In this note we show that every Banach space $X$ not containing $\ell_1^n$ uniformly and with unconditional basis contains an arbitrarily distortable subspace.

entry.title: Contractive projections in nonatomic function spaces
entry.summary: We prove that there is no 1-complemented subspace of finite codimension in separable rearrangament-invariant function spaces.

entry.title: The basic sequence problem
entry.summary: We construct a quasi-Banach space $X$ which contains no basic sequence.

entry.title: Homogeneous Fourier multipliers of Marcinkiewicz type
entry.summary: We establish various improved versions of the Marcinkiewicz multiplier theorem for homogeneous multipliers.

entry.title: On Pisier's Construction
entry.summary: A classical proof of Pisier's construction of a polynomially bounded operator not similar to a contraction is given.

entry.title: Uniform embeddings, homeomorphisms and quotient maps between Banach spaces (A short survey)
entry.summary: This is a survey of the area mentioned in the title.

entry.title: A note on pairs of projections
entry.summary: We give a brief proof of a recent result of Avron, Seiler and Simon.

entry.title: Ideal norms associated with the UMD-property
entry.summary: We prove the asymptotic equivalence of three sequences of ideal norms associated with the UMD-property of Banach spaces.

entry.title: The Calderón Commutator Along a Parabola
entry.summary: We introduce an analogue of Calder\'on's first commutator along a parabola, and establish its $L^2$ boundedness under essentially sharp hypotheses.

entry.title: Some more weak Hilbert spaces
entry.summary: We give new examples of weak Hilbert spaces.

entry.title: The largest linear space of operators satisfying the Daugavet Equation in L_1
entry.summary: We find the largest linear space of bounded linear operators on L_1(Omega), that being restricted to any L_1(A), A \subset Omega, satisfy the Daugavet equation.

entry.title: A characterization of operators preserving disjointness in terms of their inverse
entry.summary: The characterization mentioned in the title is found.
entry.arxiv:comment: To appear in Positivity, LaTeX, 10 pages

entry.title: A converse extrapolation theorem for translation invariant operators
entry.summary: We prove the converse of Yano's extrapolation theorem for translation invariant operators.
entry.arxiv:comment: 7 pages, no figures, submitted J. Funct. Anal

entry.title: Complemented subspaces of products of Banach spaces
entry.summary: We show that complemented subspaces of uncountable products of Banach spaces are products of complemented subspaces of countable subproducts.

entry.title: A continuum of totally incomparable hereditarily indecomposable Banach spaces
entry.summary: A family is constructed of cardinality equal to the continuum, whose members are totally incomparable, reflexive, hereditarily indecomposable Banach spaces.

entry.title: The dual of the James Tree space is asymptotically uniformly convex
entry.summary: The dual of the James Tree space is asymptotically uniformly convex.

entry.title: Discrete approximation of functionals with jumps and creases
entry.summary: We prove a discrete approximation of functionals with jumps and creases.

entry.title: Multilinear Calderón-Zygmund operators on Hardy spaces
entry.summary: It is shown that multilinear Calder\'on-Zygmund operators are bounded on products of Hardy spaces.

entry.title: $L^p-$maximal regularity on Banach spaces with a Schauder basis
entry.summary: We investigate the problem of $L^p$-maximal regularity on Banach spaces having a Schauder basis. Our results improve those of a recent paper.

entry.title: An Operator Hilbert space without the operator approximation property
entry.summary: We use a technique of Szankowski to construct an operator Hilbert space that does not have the operator approximation property

entry.title: Finite sums of commutators
entry.summary: We show that elements of unital $C^*$-algebras without tracial states are finite sums of commutators. Moreover, the number of commutators involved is bounded, depending only on the given $C^*$-algebra.

entry.title: Strictly singular, non-compact operators exist on the space of Gowers and Maurey
entry.summary: We construct a strictly singular non-compact operator on Gowers' and Maurey's space $GM$.

entry.title: Fourier algebra of a compact Lie group
entry.summary: Let G be a compact connected Lie group. We prove that the Fourier algebra A(G) is weakly amenable if and only if G is abelian.

entry.title: Subsymmetric sequences and minimal spaces
entry.summary: We show that every Banach space saturated with subsymmetric sequences contains a minimal subspace.
entry.arxiv:comment: 8 pages, minor corrections and redaction changes

entry.title: The Banach envelope of Paley-Wiener type spaces
entry.summary: We give an explicit computation of the Banach envelope for the Paley-Wiener type spaces $E^p, 0<p<1$. This answers a question by Joel Shapiro.

entry.title: Harmonic Analysis on Double Coset Spaces
entry.summary: We prove the existance and uniqueness of quasi-invariant measure on double cost space $K\backslash G/H$ and study the Fourier and Fourier-Stieltjes algebras of these spaces.

entry.title: Common hypercyclic vectors for composition operators
entry.summary: We study the existence of a common hypercyclic vector for different families of composition operators.

entry.title: Hilbert spaces of Dirichlet series
entry.summary: We consider various Hilbert spaces of Dirichlet series whose norms are given by weighted $\ell^2$ norms of the Dirichlet coefficients. We characterize the multiplier algebras for some of these spaces.

entry.title: Compressions and Pinchings
entry.summary: There exist operators $A$ such that : for any sequence of contractions $\{A_n\}$, there is a total sequence of mutually orthogonal projections $\{E_n\}$ such that $\Sigma E_nAE_n=\bigoplus A_n$.

entry.title: Disintegration of cylindrical measures
entry.summary: We show that the existence of disintegration for cylindrical measures follows from a general disintegration theorem for countably additive measures.

entry.title: On the local spectral properties of weighted shift operators
entry.summary: In this paper, we study the local spectral properties for both unilateral and bilateral weighted shift operators.

entry.title: Local spectra of operator weighted shifts
entry.summary: In this paper, we study the local spectral properties of unilateral operator weighted shifts.

entry.title: Factoriality of q-Gaussian von Neumann algebras
entry.summary: We prove that the von Neumann algebras generated by $n$ $q$-Gaussian elements, are factors for $n\ge 2$.

entry.title: An example for a one-parameter nonexpansive semigroup
entry.summary: We give one example for a one-parameter nonexpansive semigroup.

entry.title: Quadratic Reverses of the Triangle Inequality in Inner Product Spaces
entry.summary: Some sharp quadratic reverses for the generalised triangle inequality in inner product spaces and applications are given.

entry.title: Extensions by spaces of continuous functions
entry.summary: We characterize the Banach spaces X such that Ext(X, C(K))=0 for every compact space.

entry.title: A Remark on the Inequalities of Bernstein - Markov Type in Exponential Orlicz and Lorentz Spaces
entry.summary: We prove in this article the generalizations on the exponential Orlicz spaces Markov's - Bernstein's inequalities for algebraic polynomials and rational functions.

entry.title: Operators on (C[0,1]) preserving copies of asymptotic (\ell_1) spaces
entry.summary: It is shown that every operator on (C[0,1]) which preserves a copy of an asymptotic (\ell_1) space, also preserves a copy of (C[0,1]).

entry.title: A Proof of The Fundamental Theorem of Algebra
entry.summary: We give a proof for the fundamental theorem of algebra,using the Fredholm index phenomena
entry.arxiv:comment: Addition of preliminaries,more explain of proof

entry.title: Necessary and sufficient condition for compactness of the embedding operator
entry.summary: An improvement of the author's result, proved in 1961, concerning necessary and sufficient conditions for the compactness of an imbedding operator is given.

entry.title: A concavity inequality for symmetric norms
entry.summary: We review some convexity inequalities for Hermitian matrices an add one more to the list.

entry.title: A Direct Sum decomposition for Dual Spaces
entry.summary: We developpe a direct sum decomposition for n-dual spaces.

entry.title: Computing the complexity of the relation of isometry between separable Banach spaces
entry.summary: We compute here the Borel complexity of the relation of isometry between separable Banach spaces, using results of Gao, Kechris and Weaver.

entry.title: On extensions of Sobolev functions defined on regular subsets of metric measure spaces
entry.summary: We characterize the restrictions of first order Sobolev functions to regular subsets of a homogeneous metric space and prove the existence of the corresponding linear extension operator.

entry.title: Maharam's problem
entry.summary: We construct an exhaustive submeasure that is not equivalent to a measure. This solves problems of J. von Neumann (1937) and D. Maharam (1947).

entry.title: A Hereditarily Indecomposable asymptotic $\ell_2$ Banach space
entry.summary: A Hereditarily Indecomposable asymptotic $\ell_2$ Banach space is constructed. The existence of such a space answers a question of B. Maurey and verifies a conjecture of W.T. Gowers.

entry.title: Boolean Methods in the Theory of Vector Lattices
entry.summary: This is an overview of the recent results of interaction of Boolean valued analysis and vector lattice theory.

entry.title: Homomorphisms, amenability and weak amenability of Banach algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we find some necessary and sufficient conditions for a Banach algebra to be amenable or weakly amenable, by applying the homomorphisms on Banach algebras.

entry.title: On Construction and Some Properties of Self-Similar Functions in $L_2[0,1]$
entry.summary: The consrtuction of self-similar fuctions in $L_2[0,1]$ is described. Some properties of such funtions (boundness of variation, continuity etc.) is obtained.

entry.title: Algebraic characterizations of measure algebras
entry.summary: We present necessary and sufficient conditions for the existence of a countably additive measure on a complete Boolean algebra.

entry.title: Real Analytic Generalized Functions
entry.summary: Real analytic generalized functions are investigated as well as the analytic singular support and analytic wave front of a generalized function in $\mathcal{G}(\Omega)$ are introduced and described.

entry.title: Frechet topologies on hypoelliptic sheaves
entry.summary: This note is withdrawn. The result and its proof are available in the literature.

entry.title: Counterexamples for the convexity of certain matricial inequalities
entry.summary: This paper is withdrawn. We found a mistake in Lemma 4.1

entry.title: Coxeter Groups, Wavelets, Multiresolution and Sampling
entry.summary: In this short note we discuss the interplay between finite Coxeter groups and construction of wavelet sets, generalized multiresolution analysis and sampling.

entry.title: Heat kernels and critical limits
entry.summary: This paper is an exposition of several questions linking heat kernel measures on infinite dimensional Lie groups, limits associated with critical Sobolev exponents, and Feynmann-Kac measures for sigma models.

entry.title: Induced Measures on "Mu**"- measurable Sets
entry.summary: We investigate extension of a measure to a very general set of undetermined structure. Structure may be imposed on this set in special cases

entry.title: Concave functions of positive operators, sums and congruences
entry.summary: Subaddivity type matrix inequalities for concave funcions and symetric norms are given.

entry.title: Matrix subadditivity inequalities and block-matrices
entry.summary: Several subadditivity results and conjectures are given for matrices (or operators), block-matrices, concave functions and norms.
entry.arxiv:comment: To appear in International Journal of Mathematics

entry.title: An abstract Coifman-Rochberg-Weiss commutator theorem
entry.summary: We formulate and prove a version of the celebrated Coifman-Rochberg-Weiss commutator theorem for the real method of interpolation

entry.title: An extension problem for convex functions
entry.summary: We give a statement on extension with estimates of convex functions defined on a linear subspace, inspired by similar extension results concerning metrics on positive line bundles

entry.title: Some examples of compact composition operators on $H^2$
entry.summary: To appear in J. Functional Analysis

entry.title: A criterion of weak compactness for operators on subspaces of Orlicz spaces
entry.summary: To appear in J. Funct. Spaces and Appl.

entry.title: Operator-Valued $L_{q}\to L_{p}$ Fourier Multipliers
entry.summary: This paper is withdrawn due to some gaps in the proof

entry.title: A note on $l^p$ norms of weighted mean matrices
entry.summary: We present some results concerning the $l^p$ norms of weighted mean matrices. These results can be regarded as analogues to a result of Bennett concerning weighted Carleman's inequalities.

entry.title: $L^p$ continuity of wave operators in $\Bbb Z$
entry.summary: We recover for discrete Schr\"odinger operators on the lattice Z, stronger analogues of the results by Weder, Galtabiar and Yajima and by D'Ancona and Fanelli on R.

entry.title: On Banach Spaces containing $l_p$ or $c_0$
entry.summary: We use the Gowers block Ramsey theorem to characterize Banach spaces containing isomorphs of $\ell_p$ (for some $1 \leq p < \infty$) or $c_0$.

entry.title: A Collection of Problems on Spectrally Bounded Operators
entry.summary: We discuss several open problems on spectrally bounded operators, some new, some old, adding in a few new insights.

entry.title: Unconditional bases and strictly convex dual renormings
entry.summary: We present equivalent conditions for a space $X$ with an unconditional basis to admit an equivalent norm with a strictly convex dual norm.

entry.title: Extrapolation of Vector valued Rearrangement Operators II
entry.summary: We determine the extrapolation law for rearrangement operators of the Haar system on vector valued Hardy spaces.

entry.title: Extrapolation of Vector valued Rearrangement Operators
entry.summary: We study the extrapolation properties of vector valued rearrangement operators acting on the normalized Haar basis in $L^p_X .$

entry.title: An Interpolatory Estimate for the UMD-Valued Directional Haar Projection
entry.summary: We establish an vector-valued interpolatory estimate between directional Haar projections and Riesz transforms.

entry.title: On a result of Levin and Stečkin
entry.summary: We extend a result of Levin and Ste\v{c}kin concerning an inequality analogous to Hardy's inequality.

entry.title: Balls are Maximizers of the Riesz-Type Functionals with Supermodular Integrands
entry.summary: For a large class of supermodular integrands, we establish conditions under which balls are the unique (up to translations) maximizers of the Riesz-type functionals with constraints.

entry.title: Symmetric Ground States Solutions of M-Coupled Nonlinear Schrodinger Equations
entry.summary: We prove the existence of radial and radially decreasing ground states of an m-coupled nonlinear Schrodinger equation with a general nonlinearity.

entry.title: Loops in SU(2) and Factorization
entry.summary: We discuss a refinement of triangular factorization for loops into SU(2).

entry.title: Finite rank Toeplitz operators in Bergman spaces
entry.summary: We discuss resent developments in the problem of description of finite rank Toeplitz operators in different Bergman spaces and give some applications in analysis and mathematical physics

entry.title: A local Mazur-Ulam theorem
entry.summary: We prove a local version of the Mazur-Ulam theorem.

entry.title: A note on lineability
entry.summary: In this note we answer a question concerning lineability of the set of non-absolutely summing operators.

entry.title: Unitary loops and factorization
entry.summary: We consider a refinement of triangular factorization for unitary matrix valued loops.

entry.title: Notes of functional analysis
entry.summary: These are the unpublished notes on functional analysis, given by Professor Jaime Chica, School of Mathematics, University of Antioquia.

entry.title: Spreading models in the duals of Schlumprecht-type spaces
entry.summary: The paper has been withdrawn due to an error in the main theorem.

entry.title: Weight Hardy-Littlewood Inequalities for Different Powers
entry.summary: In this short article we obtain the non-asymptotic upper and low estimations for linear and bilinear weight Riesz's functional through the Lebesgue spaces.

entry.title: The Efimov's effect for the Fridrix's model
entry.summary: We study existance of infinitely many egenvalues of the Fridrix's model.

entry.title: Further extension of Nadler's fixed point theorem
entry.summary: In this paper, we prove a generalization of Geraghty's fixed point theorem for multi--valued mappings.

entry.title: Positive Definite Distributions and Normed Spaces
entry.summary: We answer a question of Alex Koldobsky on isometric embeddings of finite dimensional normed spaces.

entry.title: Existence of fixed points for a particular multifunction
entry.summary: We prove a fixed point theorem for a particular multifunction from the unit sphere of a reflexive Banach space with the Kadec-Klee property into itself.

entry.title: Extremal problems related to maximal dyadic like operators
entry.summary: We obtain sharp estimates for the quasi norm of the maximal function of f when it satisfies certain conditions.

entry.title: On a variant of Tartar's first commutation lemma
entry.summary: We prove a variant of Tartar's first commutation lemma involving multiplier operators with symbols not necessarily defined on a manifold of codimension one.

entry.title: Notes on a proof of Bonet, Engliš and Taskinen
entry.summary: We give a proof of a result of Bonet, Engli\v{s} and Taskinen filling in several details and correcting some flaws.

entry.title: More (\ell_r) saturated (\mathcal{L}_\infty) spaces
entry.summary: We present some new examples of separable (\mathcal_\infty) spaces which are (\ell_r) saturated for some (1 < r < \infty).

entry.title: A characterization of separable conjugate spaces
entry.summary: Necessary and sufficient conditions for a separable Banach space to be a dual space are proved. Some applications are discussed

entry.title: Construction of Symmetric Complex Tight wavelet Frames from Pseudo Splines via Matrix Extension with Symmetry
entry.summary: Construction of Symmetric Complex Tight wavelet Frames from Pseudo Splines via Matrix Extension with Symmetry.

entry.title: A note on precised Hardy inequalities on Carnot groups and Riemannian manifolds
entry.summary: We prove non local Hardy inequalities on Carnot groups and Riemannian manifolds, relying on integral representations of fractional Sobolev norms.

entry.title: On Symmetry of Minimizers in Constrained Quasi-Linear Problems, 1
entry.summary: We provide a simple proof of the radial symmetry of any nonnegative minimizer for a general class of quasi-linear minimization problems

entry.title: A Fractional Hardy-Sobolev-Maz'ya Inequality on the Upper Halfspace
entry.summary: We prove several Sobolev inequalities, which are then used to establish a fractional Hardy-Sobolev- Maz'ya inequality on the upper halfspace.

entry.title: Generalized Polya-szego Inequality
entry.summary: In this paper we prove the Polya-Inequality for integrands depending on a function u and its gradient. We also establish cases of equality in this symmetrization inequality.

entry.title: A hypercyclic rank one perturbation of a unitary operator
entry.summary: We prove that there exists a rank one perturbation of a unitary operator on a complex separable infinite dimensional Hilbert space which is hypercyclic.

entry.title: Topological properties of regular generalized function algebras
entry.summary: We investigate density of various subalgebras of regular generalized functions in the special Colombeau algebra of generalized functions.

entry.title: Arens Regularity and Module Arens Regularity of Module Actions
entry.summary: In this paper, we extend some problems from Arens regularity and module Arens regularity of Banach algebras to module actions.

entry.title: Remarks on cotype absolutely summing multilinear operators
entry.summary: In this short note we present some new results concerning cotype and absolutely summing multilinear operators.

entry.title: Iterated resolvent estimates for power bounded matrices
entry.summary: We discuss analogs of the Kreiss resolvent condition for power bounded matrices. We also explain how to extend it to analogs of the Hille-Yosida condition.

entry.title: Bornologically isomorphic representations of distributions on manifolds
entry.summary: Distributional tensor fields can be regarded as multilinear mappings with distributional values or as (classical) tensor fields with distributional coefficients. We show that the corresponding isomorphisms hold also in the bornological setting.

entry.title: Multiplicative isometries on the Smirnov class
entry.summary: The forms of surjective multiplicative isometries from the Smirnov class on the ball and the polydisk are given.

entry.title: Gauge functions for convex cones
entry.summary: We analyze a class of sublinear functionals which characterize the interior and the exterior of a convex cone in a normed linear space.

entry.title: The spine of a Fourier-Stieltjes algebra: corrigenda
entry.summary: Some unfortunate errors from our paper math/0505591 are corrected.

entry.title: Extension of Euler Lagrange identity by superquadratic power functions
entry.summary: Using convexity and superquadracity we extend in this paper Euler Lagrange identity, Bohr's inequalitiy and the triangle inequality.

entry.title: Automatic continuity for the unitary group
entry.summary: We show that every homomorphism from the infinite-dimensional unitary or orthogonal group to a separable group is continuous.

entry.title: Characterization of Positive Operators
entry.summary: A characterization of positive operators in finite dimensional complex vector spaces based on the Routh-Hurwitz Criterion.

entry.title: The Geometry of the Dyadic Maximal Operator
entry.summary: We prove a sharp integral inequality which connects the dyadic maximal operator with the Hardy operator. We also give some applications of this inequality.

entry.title: Strongly normal cones and the midpoint locally uniform rotundity
entry.summary: We give the method of construction of normal but not strongly normal positive cones in Banach space.

entry.title: Simpson Type Inequalities for m-convex Functions
entry.summary: In this paper, we establish some new inequalities for functions whose third derivatives in the absolute value are m-convex.

entry.title: New integral inequalities via $(α,m)$-convexity and quasi-convexity
entry.summary: In this paper, we establish some new integral inequalities for $(\alpha, m)-$convex functions and quasi-convex functions, respectively. Our results in special cases recapture known results.

entry.title: Polyhedron under Linear Transformations
entry.summary: The image and the inverse image of a polyhedron under a linear transformation are polyhedrons.

entry.title: New integral inequalities via P-convexity
entry.summary: In this note we extend some new estimates of the integral $\int_a^b (x-a)^p(b-x)^qf(x)dx$ for functions when a power of the absolute value is $P-$convex.

entry.title: The Amemiya-Ando conjecture falls
entry.summary: In any infinite dimensional Hilbert space H, a sequence P_n...P_1 x diverges in norm for some x \in H and orthogonal projections P_n \in {Q_1,..., Q_5}.

entry.title: On the Expectation of the Norm of Random Matrices with Non-Identically Distributed
entry.summary: We give estimates for the expectation of the norm of random matrices with independent but not necessarily identically distributed entries.

entry.title: Periodic integral operators over Cayley-Dickson algebras and spectra
entry.summary: Periodic integral operators over Cayley-Dickson algebras related with integration of PDE are studied. Their continuity and spectra are investigated.

entry.title: Inequalities via \varphi_{h,m}-convexity
entry.summary: In this paper, we define \varphi_{h,m}-convex functions and prove some inequalities for this class.

entry.title: An Inequality of Uniformly Continuous Functions in Normed Spaces
entry.summary: We obtain an interesting inequalities for uniformly continuous functions in the normed spaces: $\|f(x)\|\leq a\|x\|+b$ for some $a,b> 0$.

entry.title: On extended eigenvalues and extended eigenvectors of truncated shift
entry.summary: We give a complete description of the set of extended eigenvectors of truncated shifts defined on the model spaces K_u := H^2\ominus uH^2, in the case of u is a Blaschke product.

entry.title: Some integral inequalities for Godunova-Levin Class Functions
entry.summary: In this paper, we obtain some new inequalities for functions which are introduced by Godunova and Levin.

entry.title: Composition Operators between Analytic Campanato Spaces
entry.summary: This note characterizes both boundedness and compactness of a composition operator between any two analytic Campanato spaces on the unit complex disk.

entry.title: The Sharp Log-Sobolev Inequality on a Compact Interval
entry.summary: We provide a proof of the sharp log-Sobolev inequality on a compact interval.

entry.title: Characterisation of $L_p$-norms via Hölder's inequality
entry.summary: We characterise $L_p$-norms on the space of integrable step functions, defined on a probabilistic space, via H\"older's type inequality with an optimality condition.

entry.title: Widths of weighted Sobolev classes on a John domain
entry.summary: Estimates for Kolmogorov and linear widths of some weighted Sobolev classes on a John domain are obtained.

entry.title: A class of second order dilation invariant inequalities
entry.summary: We compute the best constants in some second order dilation invariant inequalities, with weights being powers of the distance from the origin.

entry.title: Some odd spectra
entry.summary: Partial operators can have void or unbounded spectra. Contrarily to what is written in Dunford-Schwarz, the reason is not in the fact they are unounded operators.

entry.title: Limiting Weak Type Estimate for Capacitary Maximal Function
entry.summary: A capacitary analogue of the limiting weak type estimate of P. Janakiraman for the Hardy-Littlewood maximal function of an L1-function is discovered.

entry.title: Weighted composition operators on weak vector-valued weighted Bergman spaces and Hardy spaces
entry.summary: In this paper we investigate weighted composition operators between weak and strong vector valued weighted Bergman spaces and Hardy spaces.

entry.title: A real seminorm with square property is submultiplicative
entry.summary: A seminorm with square property on a real associative algebra is submultiplicative

entry.title: Young type inequalities for weighted spaces
entry.summary: We establish sharp convolution and multiplication estimates in weighted Lebesgue, Fourier Lebesgue and modulation spaces. Especially we recover some known results.

entry.title: Decompositions of Weighted Conditional Expectation Type Operators
entry.summary: In this paper we investigate boundedness, polar decomposition and spectral decomposition of weighted conditional expectation type operators on L^2(\Sigma).

entry.title: Taylor approximations of operator functions
entry.summary: This survey on approximations of perturbed operator functions addresses recent advances and some of the successful methods.

entry.title: Definitions of almost periodicity
entry.summary: Various versions of the classical definitions of (one- and twosided) almost periodicity for functions on groups with values in a uniform space are formulated and their equivalence is shown.

entry.title: Approximating Continuous Functions with Scattered Translates of the Poisson Kernel
entry.summary: The goal of this note is to show that continuous functions may be approximated using scattered translates of the Poisson kernel.

entry.title: Multiplication Conditional Expectation Type Operators On Orlicz Spaces
entry.summary: In this paper we consider a generalized conditional-type Holder- inequality and investigate some classic properties of multiplication conditional expectation type operators on Orlicz-spaces.

entry.title: Structural theorems for ultradistribution semigroups
entry.summary: We consider exponential ultradistribution semigroups with non--densely defined generators and give structural theorems for ultradistribution semigroups. Also structural theorems for exponential ultradistribution semigroups are given.

entry.title: On the isomorphisms of Fourier algebras of finite abelian groups
entry.summary: We consider gerenalizated permutation equivalence of Vielenkin system on commutative compact torsion finite exponent groups.

entry.title: Colombeau Algebra: A pedagogical introduction
entry.summary: A simple pedagogical introduction to the Colombeau algebra of generalised functions is presented, leading the standard definition.

entry.title: Composition operators between two different bilateral grand Lebesgue spaces
entry.summary: In this paper we consider composition operator generated by nonsingular measurable transformation between two different Grand Lebesgue Spaces (GLS); we investigate the boundedness, compactness and essential norm of composition operators.

entry.title: Compact Lambert Type Operators Between Two l^p Spaces
entry.summary: In this paper we investigate compactness of weighted Lambert type operators between two Lp spaces

entry.title: Hyperinner product spaces
entry.summary: In this paper, we introduce the concept of inner product on weak hypervector spaces and prove some results about them.

entry.title: Embeddings between weighted local Morrey-type spaces and weighted Lebesgue spaces
entry.summary: In this paper, the embeddings between weighted local Morrey-type spaces and weighted Lebesgue spaces are investigated.

entry.title: Non-commutative perspectives
entry.summary: We prove that the non-commutative perspective of an operator convex function is the unique extension of the corresponding commutative perspective that preserves homogeneity and convexity.

entry.title: Lyapunov theorem for q-concave Banach spaces
entry.summary: Generalization of Lyapunov convexity theorem is proved for vector measure with values in Banach spaces with unconditional bases, which are q-concave for some $q<\infty.$

entry.title: Hardy's theorem for compact Lie groups
entry.summary: We show that Hardy's uncertainty principle can be reformulated in such a way that it has an analogue even for compact Lie groups and symmetric spaces of compact type.

entry.title: Paley type inequality for the Fourier transform on the Heisenberg group
entry.summary: A Paley type inequality for the Fourier transform on $H^p(H^n);$ the Hardy space on the Heisenberg group, is obtained for $0 < p \leq 1.$

entry.title: A Banach space with a countable infinite number of complex structures
entry.summary: We give examples of real Banach spaces with exactly infinite countably many complex structures and with $\omega_1$ many complex structures.

entry.title: A note on the $luc-$compactification of locally compact groups
entry.summary: Let $G$ be a locally compact non-compact topological group. We show that $G^{luc}$ ($G^*$) is an F-space if and only if $G$ is a discrete group.

entry.title: Weighted Big Lipschitz algebras of analytic functions and closed ideals
entry.summary: We give the smallest closed ideal with given hull and inner factor for some weighted big Lipschitz algebras of analytic functions.

entry.title: New inequalities for n- time differntiable functions
entry.summary: In this paper, we obtain several inequalities of Ostrowski type that the absolute values of n-time differntiable functions are convex.

entry.title: Contractions Which Obtained by Equivalent Metric of Cone Metric
entry.summary: In this paper we try to collect certain contractions which can be obtained by equivalent metric of cone metric.
entry.arxiv:comment: 13 pages. arXiv admin note: substantial text overlap with arXiv:1102.2353

entry.title: Compact Product of Hankel and Toeplitz Operators
entry.summary: In this paper, we study the product of a Hankel operator and a Toeplitz operator on the Hardy space. We give necessary and sufficient conditions of when such a product $H_f T_g$ is compact.

entry.title: Weighted opial inequalities for widder derivatives
entry.summary: In this paper, we establish some new general Opial inequalities for Widder derivatives.

entry.title: Lebesgue decomposition via Riesz orthogonal decomposition
entry.summary: We give a simple and short proof of the classical Lebesgue decomposition theorem of measures via the Riesz orthogonal decomposition theorem of Hilbert spaces. The tools we employ are elementary Hilbert space techniques.

entry.title: A simple proof of the Lebesgue decomposition theorem
entry.summary: The aim of this short note is to present an elementary, self-contained, and direct proof for the classical Lebesgue decomposition theorem.

entry.title: Isometric and invertible composition operators on weighted Bergman spaces of Dirichlet series
entry.summary: We show that a composition operator on weighted Bergman spaces $\mathcal{A}_{\mu}^p$ is invertible if and only if it is Fredholm if and only if it is an isometry.

entry.title: An imbedding of fractional order Sobolev-Grand Lebesgue spaces, with constant evaluation
entry.summary: We extend in this article the classical imbedding theorems for fractional Lebesgue-Sobolev's spaces into the so-called Grand Lebesgue spaces, with sharp constant evaluation.

entry.title: Approximate amenability of Segal algebras II
entry.summary: We prove that every proper Segal algebra of a SIN group is not approximately amenable.

entry.title: Two classes of Meir-Keeler contractions
entry.summary: In the present paper, we prove that Z-contractions and weakly type contractions are actually Meir-Keeler contractions.

entry.title: On three open problems related to quasi relative interior
entry.summary: We give answers to two questions formulated by Borwein and Goebel in 2003 and to a conjecture formulated by Grad and Pop in 2014 related to calculus rules for quasi (relative) interior.

entry.title: Ornstein's non-inequalities Riesz product approach
entry.summary: We provide a new technique to prove Ornstein's non-inequalities for derivatives with some geometrical dependence on their indexes.

entry.title: Inequalities for Euler-Mascheroni constant
entry.summary: The aim of this paper is to establish new inequalities for the Euler-Mascheroni by the continued fraction method.

entry.title: Maximal ideals in commutative Banach algebras
entry.summary: We show that each maximal ideal in a commutative Banach algebra has codimension 1.

entry.title: A short proof of Stein's universal multiplier theorem
entry.summary: We give a short proof of Stein's universal multiplier theorem, purely by probabilistic methods, thus avoiding any use of harmonic analysis techniques (complex interpolation or transference methods).

entry.title: A random version of Simons' inequality
entry.summary: The purpose of this paper is to provide a random version of Simons' inequality.

entry.title: Universal entropy invariants
entry.summary: We define entropy invariants for abstract algebraic structures using an asymptotic Boltzmann formula.

entry.title: Common hypercyclic functions for translation operators with large gaps
entry.summary: We prove the existence of common hypercyclic, entire functions for certain uncountable families of traslation type operators with relative large gaps.

entry.title: Operator monotonicity of some functions
entry.summary: We investigate the operator monotonicity of functions which was considered by V.E. Szabo.

entry.title: A simple proof for the convexity of the Choquet integral
entry.summary: This note presents an elementary and direct proof for the convexity of the Choquet integral when the corresponding set function is submodular.

entry.title: Approximation numbers of composition operators on Hp
entry.summary: We give estimates for the approximation numbers of composition operators on the Hp spaces, 1 $\le$ p \textless{} $\infty$.

entry.title: Sätze vom Bohman-Korovkin-Typ für lokalkonvexe Vektorverbände
entry.summary: The convergence behavior of positive linear operators between certain locally convev vector lattices is reconsidered here.

entry.title: On the paper "statistical approximation by positive linear operators"
entry.summary: We give an example to show that the main result of [1] is incorrect.

entry.title: On properties of multiplication and composition operators between Orlicz spaces
entry.summary: In this paper, we study bounded and closed range multiplication and composition operators between two different Orlicz spaces.

entry.title: On characterizations of $\mathcal{MT}(λ)$-functions
entry.summary: In this paper, we introduce and share the new concept of $\mathcal{MT}(\lambda )$-functions and its some characterizations.

entry.title: Rockafellar's Sum Theorem
entry.summary: We show how to remove the boundedness condition from Eberhard-Wenczel proof of the Rockafellar's Sum Theorem.

entry.title: Helffer-Sj{ö}strand formula for Unitary Operators
entry.summary: The objective of this paper to give a formula for unitary operators that corresponds to the Heler-Sj{\"o}strand formula for self-adjoint operators.

entry.title: Transfunctions
entry.summary: Maps between spaces of measures on measurable spaces $(X,\Sigma_X)$ and $(Y, \Sigma_Y)$ are treated as generalized functions between $X$ and $Y$.

entry.title: Partitions of Unity and New Obstructions for Gabor Frames
entry.summary: We derive new obstructions for Gabor frames. This note explains and proves the computer generated observations of Lemvig and Nielsen in arXiv:1507.03982.

entry.title: When powers of a matrix coincide with its Hadamard powers
entry.summary: We characterize matrices whose powers coincide with their Hadamard powers.

entry.title: A note on summability of multilinear forms on classical sequence spaces
entry.summary: We obtain some optimal estimates for multilinear forms on $\ell _{p}$ spaces.

entry.title: On New Refinements and Reverses of Young's Operator Inequality
entry.summary: In this paper we obtain some new refinements and reverses of Young's operator inequality. Extensions for convex functions of operators are also provided.

entry.title: Sine and cosine equations on commutative hypergroups
entry.summary: In this paper we describe the solutions of the functional equations expressing the addition theorems for sine and cosine on commutative hypergroups.

entry.title: Uniform distribution with respect to density
entry.summary: The paper deals with a generalisation of uniform distribution. The analogues of Weyl's criterion are derived.

entry.title: A characterization of barrelledness of $C_p(X)$
entry.summary: We prove that, for a Tychonoff space $X$, the space $C_p(X)$ is barrelled if and only if it is a Mackey group.

entry.title: On characterization of operator monotone functions
entry.summary: In this paper, we will show a new characterization of operator monotone functions by a matrix reverse Cauchy inequality.

entry.title: An inequality for t-geometric means
entry.summary: In this note we prove an inequality for t-geometric means that immediately implies the recent results of Audenaert [2] and Hayajneh-Kittaneh [6].

entry.title: The weak Banach-Saks property for function spaces
entry.summary: We establish the weak Banach-Saks property for function spaces arising as the optimal domain of an operator.

entry.title: On the paper: Numerical radius preserving linear maps on Banach algebras
entry.summary: In this note, we give a counterexample disproving two results in the above paper.

entry.title: An application of internal objects to microlocal analysis in generalized function algebras
entry.summary: We illustrate the use of internal objects in the nonlinear theory of generalized functions by means of an application to microlocal analysis in Colombeau algebras.

entry.title: Group Representations on Reflexive Spaces
entry.summary: For weighted group convoltion measure algebra we construct a representation on reflexsive space.
entry.arxiv:comment: 13. arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:1501.06428

entry.title: On the convergence of products of operator nets
entry.summary: The generalization of the Jessen-Marcinkiewicz-Zygmund-type theorem for the abstract space with measure was obtained in current paper. Some applications to classical harmonic analysis were reviewed.

entry.title: Compact Operations on Model Spaces
entry.summary: We give a characterization of the compact operators on a model space in terms of asymptotic Toeplitz operators.

entry.title: Fredholm Operators and Spectral Flow
entry.summary: These are extended lecture notes of a PhD course that the author gave at the Universita degli studi di Torino in Italy in spring 2013.
entry.arxiv:comment: 61 pages, lecture notes of a PhD course

entry.title: Functions with strictly convex epigraph
entry.summary: The aim of this paper is to provide a complete and simple characterization of functions with domain in a topological real vector space whose epigraph is strictly convex.

entry.title: Metrical Characterizations of super weakly compact operators
entry.summary: We characterize super weakly compact operators as those through which binary tree and diamond and Laakso graphs may not be factored with uniform distortion.

entry.title: Semicontinuity in Ordered Banach Spaces
entry.summary: We extend the C*-algebra semicontinuity theory of Akemann, Brown and Pedersen to (pre)ordered Banach spaces.

entry.title: Unitaries in Ultraproduct of Matrices
entry.summary: We study various conditions under which a unitary in an ultraproduct of matrices is conjugated to an ultraproduct of permutations.

entry.title: On Banachic Kernels and Approximation Theory
entry.summary: In this paper, I generalize a previous one about hilbertian kernels and approximation theory

entry.title: Newton and Bouligand derivatives of the scalar play and stop operator
entry.summary: We prove that the play and the stop operator possess Newton and Bouligand derivatives, and exhibit formulas for those derivatives.

entry.title: Quantitative Factorization of weakly compact, Rosenthal, and $ξ$-Banach-Saks operators
entry.summary: We prove quantitative factorization results for several classes of operators, including weakly compact, Rosenthal, and $\xi$-Banach-Saks operators.

entry.title: Generalized Bernstein-type approximation of continuous functions
entry.summary: We derive in this short article the non-asymptotical non-uniform sharp error estimation for the Bernstein's type approximation of continuous function based on the modern probabilistic apparatus.

entry.title: Trigonometric approximation in Sobolev-Grand Lebesgue Spaces
entry.summary: We study in this short preprint the theory of trigonometric approximation in the so-called Banach functional rearrangement invariant Sobolev-Grand Lebesgue Spaces.

entry.title: Maximal monotonicity of the subdifferential of a convex function: a direct proof
entry.summary: We provide a new proof for maximal monotonicity of the subdifferential of a convex function.

entry.title: Operators on Bourgain-Delbaen's spaces
From Hopf-Lax formula to optimal weak transfer plan
entry.summary: We study the properties of Hopf-Lax formula restricted to convex functions and characterize the optimal transfer plan for weak transport problem.

entry.title: Hölder-Besov boundedness for periodic pseudo-differential operators
entry.summary: In this work we give H\"older-Besov estimates for periodic Fourier multipliers. We present a class of bounded pseudo-differential operators on periodic Besov spaces with symbols of limited regularity.

entry.title: A short proof of the HRT conjecture for almost every (1,3) configuration
entry.summary: Based on the proof of Demeter \cite{Dem10}, we establish the HRT conjecture for almost every (1,3) configuration.

entry.title: Isotropic and Dominating Mixed Lizorkin - Triebel Spaces - a Comparison
entry.summary: We shall compare isotropic Lizorkin-Triebel spaces with their counterparts of dominating mixed smoothness.

entry.title: A remark on bounded sets in the product of topological groups
entry.summary: In this short note, we characterize bounded sets in the arbitrary product of topological groups with respect to the both product and box topologies.

entry.title: Parseval space-frequency localized frames on sub-Riemannian compact homogeneous manifolds
entry.summary: The objective of this article is to describe a construction of Parseval bandlimited and localized frames on sub-Riemannian compact homogeneous manifolds.

entry.title: New Multirectional Mean Value Inequality
entry.summary: We establish new and stronger inequality of Clarke-Ledyaev type by direct construction.

entry.title: Notes on Tensor Product Measures
entry.summary: C.Swartz' result on tensor product measures is reviewed with proofs from the scratch.

entry.title: Effective descent morphisms for Banach modules
entry.summary: It is proved that a norm-decreasing homomorphism of commutative Banach algebras is an effective descent morphism for Banach modules if and only if it is a weak retract.

entry.title: How to construct wavelets on local fields of positive characteristic
entry.summary: We present an algorithm for construction step wavelets on local fields of positive characteristic.

entry.title: On universal operators and universal pairs
entry.summary: We study some basic properties of the class of universal operators on Hilbert space, and provide new examples of universal operators and universal pairs.

entry.title: Some Rules of Elementary Transformation in $B^{+}(E,F)$ and their applications
entry.summary: In this paper, some rules of elementary transformation in $B^{+}(E,F)$ are presented. Then we give some applications to topology and analysis for operators.

entry.title: The Hautus test for non-autonomous linear evolution equation
entry.summary: In this paper, we investigate the Hautus test for evolution equation with the operators depending on time.

entry.title: Valuations on Convex Functions
entry.summary: All continuous, SL$(n)$ and translation invariant valuations on the space of convex functions on ${\mathbb R}^n$ are completely classified.

entry.title: Consistent operator semigroups and their interpolation
entry.summary: Under a mild regularity condition we prove that the generator of the interpolation of two C0-semigroups is the interpolation of the two generators.

entry.title: An Improvement of Reid Inequality
entry.summary: In this short note, we improve the famous Reid Inequality related to linear operators.

entry.title: A refinement of Hardy Inequality via superquadratic function
entry.summary: A refinement of the Hardy inequality has been presented by use of superquadratic function.

entry.title: Generalization of a theorem of Zippin
entry.summary: We generalize and prove a result which was first shown by Zippin, and was explicitly formulated by Benyamini.

entry.title: Approximate similarity of operators on l^p
entry.summary: We prove a version of Voiculescu's noncommutative Weyl-von Neumann theorem for operators on $l^{p}$ for $1<p<\infty$.

entry.title: Trace and extension operators for fractional Sobolev spaces with variable exponent
entry.summary: We show that, under certain regularity assumptions, there exists a linear extension operator.

entry.title: Towards a theory of unbounded locally solid Riesz spaces
entry.summary: We introduce the notion of unbounded locally solid Riesz spaces, and investigate its fundamental properties.

entry.title: Pompeiu-Chebyshev type inequalities for selfadjoint operators in Hilbert spaces
entry.summary: In this work, generalization of some inequalities for continuous $h$-synchronous ($h$-asynchronous) functions of selfadjoint linear operators in Hilbert spaces are proved.

entry.title: Inequalities similar to those of Bernstein for non-periodic splines in $L_2$ space
entry.summary: We prove Inequalities similar to those of Bernstein for non-periodic splines in $L_2$ space.

entry.title: Bernstein type inequality in the shift-invariant spaces
entry.summary: We are proving a Bernstein type inequality in the shift-invariant spaces of $L_2(R)$.

entry.title: The open mapping principle for partial actions of polish groups
entry.summary: We present a extension of the classical open mapping principle and Effros' theorem for Polish group actions to the context of partial group actions.

entry.title: Improving Schwarz Inequality in Inner Product Spaces
entry.summary: Some improvements of the celebrated Schwarz inequality in complex inner product spaces are given. Applications for n-tuples of complex numbers are provided.

entry.title: Normal Truncated Toeplitz Operators
entry.summary: The characterization of normal truncated Toepltiz operators is first given by Chalendar and Timotin. We give a different proof of their result without using the algebraic properties of truncated Toeplitz operators.

entry.title: Approximation of fixed points of nonexpansive mappings and quasinonexpansive mappings in a Hilbert space
entry.summary: In this paper, we give a simple proof and some generalizations of results in Falset, Llorens-Fuster, Marino, and Rugiano (2016).

entry.title: p-Riesz bases in quasi shift invariant spaces
entry.summary: Let $ 1\leq p< \infty$ and let $\psi\in L^{p}(\R^d)$. We study $p-$Riesz bases of quasi shift invariant spaces $V^p(\psi;Y)$.

entry.title: Weighted Fourier Frames on Self-Affine Measures
entry.summary: Continuing the ideas from our previous paper \cite{DR16}, we construct Parseval frames of weighted exponential functions for self-affine measures.

entry.title: Prevalence: an addendum
entry.summary: The authors mention work of Christensen, Mycielski, Tsujii, and others which is closely related to a survey article by the first author [math.FA/9210220].

entry.title: On Banach spaces without the approximation property
entry.summary: A. Szankowski's example is used to construct a Banach space similar to that of "An example of an asymptotically Hilbertian space which fails the approximation property", P.G. Casazza, C.L. Garc\'{\i}a, W.B. Johnson [math.FA/0006134 (math@arXiv.org)].
entry.arxiv:comment: 3 pages, AMSTeX; just a translation and nothing more
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Funkts. analiz i ego prilozhen. (1982), v. 16, vyp. 4, p. 84-85 (in Russian)

entry.title: Non-Isomorphic Product Systems
entry.summary: Uncountably many mutually non-isomorphic product systems (that is, continuous tensor products of Hilbert spaces) of types II-0 and III are constructed by probabilistic means (random sets and off-white noises), answering four questions of W. Arveson. Results of math.FA/0001070, math.FA/0006165 are improved, and proofs are more readable.
entry.arxiv:comment: 70 pages. Small errors corrected, especially in 1.9, 2.3, 5.8 (formulations) and 13.6, 13.7 (proofs)
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Advances in Quantum Dynamics (eds G Price et al), Contemp Math 335, AMS, pp 273-328 (2003).

entry.title: On quotients of Banach spaces having shrinking unconditional bases
entry.summary: It is proved that if a Banach space $Y$ is a quotient of a Banach space having a shrinking unconditional basis, then every normalized weakly null sequence in $Y$ has an unconditional subsequence. The proof yields the corollary that every quotient of Schreier's space is $c_o$-saturated.

entry.title: The proportional UAP characterizes weak Hilbert spaces
entry.summary: We prove that a Banach space has the uniform approximation property with proportional growth of the uniformity function iff it is a weak Hilbert space.

entry.title: Non dentable sets in Banach spaces with separable dual
entry.summary: A non RNP Banach space E is constructed such that $E^{*}$ is separable and RNP is equivalent to PCP on the subsets of E.

entry.title: Banach spaces with Property (w)
entry.summary: A Banach space E is said to have Property (w) if every (bounded linear) operator from E into E' is weakly compact. We give some interesting examples of James type Banach spaces with Property (w). We also consider the passing of Property (w) from E to C(K,E).

entry.title: The K_t-functional for the interpolation couple L_1(A_0),L_infinity(A_1)
entry.summary: Let (A_0,A_1) be a compatible couple of Banach spaces in the interpolation theory sense. We give a formula for the K_t-functional of the interpolation couples (l_1(A_0),c_0(A_1)) or (l_1(A_0),l_infinity(A_1)) and (L_1(A_0),L_infinity(A_1)).

entry.title: On certain classes of Baire-1 functions with applications to Banach space theory
entry.summary: Certain subclasses of $B_1(K)$, the Baire-1 functions on a compact metric space $K$, are defined and characterized. Some applications to Banach spaces are given.

entry.title: Jean Bourgain's analytic partition of unity via holomorphic martingales
entry.summary: Using stopping time arguments on holomorphic martingales we present a soft way of constructing J. Bourgain's analytic partitions of unity. Applications to Marcinkiewicz interploation in weighted Hardy spaces are discussed.

entry.title: The Compact Approximation Property does not imply the Approximation Property
entry.summary: It is shown how to construct, given a Banach space which does not have the approximation property, another Banach space which does not have the approximation property but which does have the compact approximation property.

entry.title: On $c_0$-saturated Banach spaces
entry.summary: A Banach space E is c_0-saturated if every closed infinite dimensional subspace of E contains an isomorph of c_0. A c_0-saturated Banach space with an unconditional basis which has a quotient space isomorphic to l^2 is constructed.

entry.title: Unrestricted products of contractions in Banach spaces
entry.summary: Let $X$ be a reflexive Banach space such that for any $x \ne 0$ the set $$ \{x^* \in X^*: \text {$\|x^*\|=1$ and $x^*(x)=\|x\|$}\} $$ is compact. We prove that any unrestricted product of of a finite number of $(W)$ contractions on $X$ converges weakly.

entry.title: Operators preserving orthogonality are isometries
entry.summary: Let $E$ be a real Banach space. For $x,y \in E,$ we follow R.James in saying that $x$ is orthogonal to $y$ if $\|x+\alpha y\|\geq \|x\|$ for every $\alpha \in R$. We prove that every operator from $E$ into itself preserving orthogonality is an isometry multiplied by a constant.

entry.title: A factorization constant for $l^n_p
entry.summary: We prove that if PT is a factorization of the identity operator on \ell_p^n through \ell_{\infty}^k, then ||P|| ||T|| \geq Cn^{1/p-1/2}(log n)^{-1/2}. This is a corollary of a more general result on factoring the identity operator on a quasi-normed space through \ell_{\infty}^k.

entry.title: On impossible extensions of Krivine's Theorem
entry.summary: We give examples of two Banach spaces. One Banach space has no spreading model which contains $\ell_p$ ($1\le p<\infty$) or $c_0$. The other space has an unconditional basis for which $\ell_p$ ($1\le p<\infty$) and $c_0$ are block finitely represented in all block bases.

entry.title: A Dvoretsky Theorem for Polynomials
entry.summary: We lift upper and lower estimates from linear functionals to $n$-homogeneous polynomials and using this result show that $l_\infty$ is finitely represented in the space of $n$-homogeneous polynomials, $n\ge2$, for any infinite dimensional Banach space. Refinements are also given.

entry.title: An elementary example of a Banach space not isomorphic to its complex conjugate
entry.summary: We give a simple and explicit example of a complex Banach space which is not isomorphic to its complex conjugate, and hence of two real-isomorphic spaces which are not complex-isomorphic.

entry.title: Quojections without Banach subspaces
entry.summary: A quojection (projective limit of Banach spaces with surjective linking mappings) without infinite dimensional Banach subspaces is constructed. This results answers a question posed by G.Metafune and V.B.Moscatelli.

entry.title: Complex interpolation and complementably minimal spaces
entry.summary: We construct a class of super-reflexive complementably minimal spaces, and study uniformly convex distortions of the norm on Hilbert space by using methods of complex interpolation.

entry.title: Uniform Kadec-Klee Property in Banach lattices
entry.summary: We prove that a Banach lattice $X$ which does not contain the $l^n_{\infty}$-uniformly has an equivalent norm which is uniformly Kadec-Klee for a natural topology $\tau$ on $X$. In case the Banach lattice is purely atomic, the topology $\tau$ is the coordinatewise convergence topology.

entry.title: The existence of primitives for continuous functions in a quasi-Banach space
entry.summary: We show that if $X$ is a quasi-Banach space with trivial dual then every continuous function $f:[0,1]\to X$ has a primitive, answering a question of M.M. Popov.

entry.title: Extension of Operators from Weak$^*$-closed Subspaces of $\ell_1$
entry.summary: It is proved that every operator from a weak$^*$-closed subspace of $\ell_1$ into a space $C(K)$ of continuous functions on a compact Hausdorff space $K$ can be extended to an operator from $\ell_1$ to $C(K)$.

entry.title: Structural properties of weak cotype 2 spaces
entry.summary: Several characterizations of weak cotype 2 and weak Hilbert spaces are given in terms of basis constants and other structural invariants of Banach spaces. For finite-dimensional spaces, characterizations depending on subspaces of fixed proportional dimension are proved.

entry.title: Smooth functions and partitions of unity on certain Banach spaces
entry.summary: We construct infinitely differentiable norms and partitions of unity for a class of Banach spaces which includes all spaces $\C(K)$ with $K$ a countable compact space, and all spaces $\C_0[0,\Omega )$ with $\Omega $ an ordinal.

entry.title: A representation of isometries on function spaces
entry.summary: The main result says that every surjective isometry between two ideal Banach function spaces satisfying certain conditions can be presented as a composition of a measurable transformation of a variable and multiplication by a function.

entry.title: Constructions of $\Cal L_p$ spaces for $p \in (1,\infty)\setminus \{2\}$
entry.summary: This is an exposition of the known techniques for constructing $\Cal L_p$-spaces for $p\in (1,\infty)\setminus \{2\}$, including some unpublished work of Alspach. Isomorphic and complemented embedding relations between these spaces are also explored.

entry.title: Convex unconditionality and summability of weakly null sequences
entry.summary: It is proved that every normalized weakly null \sq\ has a sub\sq\ which is convexly unconditional. Further, an Hierarchy of summability methods is introduced and with this we give a complete classification of the complexity of weakly null \sq s.

entry.title: Rearrangements of the Haar system which preserve $\BMO$
entry.summary: In this paper general rearrangements of the Haar system in BMO are considered. Several, necessary and suficient, conditions for the boundednes of the induced permutation operator are given. Using analytic families of operators extensions to the case of $L^p$ are obtained .

entry.title: Elliptic boundary value problems for the inhomogeneous Laplace equation on bounded domains
entry.summary: Elliptic estimates in Hardy classes are proved on domains with minimally smooth boundary. The methodology is different from the original methods of Chang/Krantz/Stein.

entry.title: A Representation of Stable Banach Spaces
entry.summary: We show that any separable stable Banach space can be represented as a group of isometries on a separable reflexive Banach space, which extends a result of S. Guerre and M. Levy. As a consequence, we can then represent homeomorphically its space of types.

entry.title: Analytic hypoellipticity in dimension two
entry.summary: A simple geometric condition is sufficient for analytic hypoellipticity of sums of squares of two vector fields in ${\mathbb R}^2$. This condition is proved to be necessary for generic vector fields and for various special cases, and to be both necessary and sufficient for a closely related family of operators.

entry.title: Property $\text{(u)}$ in $JH\tilde{\otimes}_εJH$
entry.summary: It is shown that the tensor product $JH\epten JH$ fails Pe\l cz\'{n}yski's property (u). The proof uses a result of Kwapie\'{n} and Pe\l cz\'{n}yski on the main triangle projection in matrix spaces.

entry.title: Intermediate Optimal Gevrey Exponents Occur
entry.summary: Hypoellipticity in Gevrey classes $G^s$ is characterized for a simple family of sums of squares of vector fields satisfying the bracket hypothesis, with analytic coefficients. It is shown that hypoellipticity holds if and only if $s$ is greater than or equal to an optimal exponent that may take on any rational value.

entry.title: A Banach space block finitely universal for monotone bases
entry.summary: A reflexive Banach space $X$ with a basis $(e_i)$ is constructed having the property that every monotone basis is block finitely representable in each block basis of $X$.

entry.title: Operators with extension property and the principle of local reflexivity
entry.summary: Given an arbitrary $p$-Banach ideal $(0 < p \leq 1)$, we ask for geometrical properties of this ideal which are sufficient (and necessary) to allow a transfer of the principle of local reflexivity to this operator class.

entry.title: Products of Block Toeplitz operators
entry.summary: In this paper we characterize when the product of two block Toeplitz operators is a compact perturbation of a block Toeplitz operator on the Hardy space of the open unit disk. Necessary and sufficient conditions are given for the commutator of two block Toeplitz operators to be compact.

entry.title: The Daugavet equation for operators not fixing a copy of $C(S)$
entry.summary: We prove the norm identity $\|Id+T\| = 1+\|T\|$, which is known as the Daugavet equation, for operators $T$ on $C(S)$ not fixing a copy of $C(S)$, where $S$ is a compact metric space without isolated points.

entry.title: Erratum to: ``Banach spaces without local unconditional structure''
entry.summary: This note contains a corrected proof of the main result (which remains unchanged) from [K-T]. It was recently observed that an argument in a basic technical criterium has a gap.

entry.title: Extensions of $c_0$
entry.summary: If $X$ is a closed subspace of a Banach space $L$ which embeds into a Banach lattice not containing $\ell_\infty^n$'s uniformly and $L/X$ contains $\ell_\infty^n$'s uniformly, then $X$ cannot have local unconditional structure in the sense of Gordon-Lewis (GL-{\sl l.u.st.}).

entry.title: M-ideals of compact operators into $\ell_p$
entry.summary: We show for $2\le p<\infty$ and subspaces $X$ of quotients of $L_{p}$ with a $1$-unconditional finite-dimensional Schauder decomposition that $K(X,\ell_{p})$ is an $M$-ideal in $L(X,\ell_{p})$.

entry.title: One-complemented subspaces of real sequence spaces
entry.summary: Characterizations are given for 1-complemented hyperplanes of strictly monotone real Lorentz spaces and 1-complemented finite codimensional subspaces (which contain at least one basis element) of real Orlicz spaces equipped with either Luxemburg or Orlicz norm.

entry.title: The near Radon-Nikodym property in Lebesgue-Bochner function spaces
entry.summary: Let $X$ be a Banach space $E$ a K\"othe function space that does not contain $c_0$. It is shown that the vector valued function space $E(X)$ has the Near Radon Nikodym property if and only if $X$ does.

entry.title: On a reverse form of the Brascamp-Lieb inequality
entry.summary: We prove a reverse form of the multidimensional Brascamp-Lieb inequality. Our method also gives a new way to derive the Brascamp-Lieb inequality and is rather convenient for the study of equality cases.

entry.title: Generalizing the Paley-Wiener perturbation theory for Banach spaces
entry.summary: We extend the Paley-Wiener pertubation theory to linear operators mapping a subspace of one Banach space into another Banach space.

entry.title: Stability results on interpolation scales of quasi-Banach spaces and applications
entry.summary: We investigate stability of Fredholm properties on interpolation scales of quasi-Banach spaces. This analysis is motivated by problems arising in PDE's and several applications are presented.

entry.title: Bellman functions and two weight inequalities for Haar multipliers
entry.summary: We give necessary and sufficient conditions for two weight norm inequalities for Haar multipliers operators and for square functions. We also give sufficient conditions for two weight norm inequalities for the Hilbert transform.

entry.title: Interpolating hereditarily indecomposable Banach spaces
entry.summary: It is shown that every Banach space either contains $\ell ^1$ or it has an infinite dimensional closed subspace which is a quotient of a H.I. Banach space.Further on, $L^p(\lambda )$, $1<p<\infty $, is a quotient of a H.I Banach space.

entry.title: Hypoellipticity: Geometrization and Speculation
entry.summary: To any finite collection of smooth real vector fields $X_j$ in $\reals^n$ we associate a metric in the phase space $T^*\reals^n$. The relation between the asymptotic behavior of this metric and hypoellipticity of $\sum X_j^2$, in the smooth, real analytic, and Gevrey categories, is explored.

entry.title: Remarks about Schlumprecht space
entry.summary: We prove that Schlumprecht space $S$ is isomorphic to $(\sum_{k=1}^\infty \oplus \ell_infty ^{n_k})_S $ for any sequence of integers $(n_k)$. We also show that every complemented subspace of $S$ which has some subsymmetric basis, is isomorphic to $S$.

entry.title: Interactive games and representation theory
entry.summary: This short note is a conceptual prologue to the series of articles devoted to the analysis of interrelations between the representation theory (especially, its inverse problems) and the control and games theory.
entry.arxiv:comment: revised version (3 pages, AMSTEX): remark 4 is added

entry.title: On local automorphisms of group algebras of compact groups
entry.summary: We show that with few exceptions every local isometric automorphism of the group algebra $L^p(G)$ of a compact group $G$ is an isometric automorphism.

entry.title: Characterizing Hilbert space frames with the subframe property
entry.summary: We characterize Riesz frames and frames with the subframe property and use this to answer most of the questions from the literature concerning these properties and their relationships to the projection methods etc.

entry.title: Subsequences of frames
entry.summary: Every frame in Hilbert space contains a subsequence equivalent to an orthogonal basis. If a frame is n-dimensional then this subsequence has length (1 - \epsilon) n. On the other hand, there is a frame which does not contain bases with brackets.

entry.title: Some Remarks on Vector-Valued Integration
entry.summary: The article presents a new method of integration of functions with values in Banach spaces. This integral and related notions prove to be a useful tool in the study of Banach space geomtry.

entry.title: Invariant manifolds of hypercyclic vectors for the real scalar case
entry.summary: We show that every hypercyclic operator on a real locally convex space admits a dense, invariant linear manifold of hypercyclic vectors.

entry.title: Applications of the Wavelet Multiplicity Function
entry.summary: This paper examines the wavelet multiplicity function. An explicit formula for the multiplicity function is derived. An application to operator interpolation is then presented. We conclude with several remarks regarding the wavelet connectivity problem.

entry.title: A solution to the problem of $L^p-$maximal regularity
entry.summary: We give a negative solution to the problem of the $L^p$-maximal regularity on various classes of Banach spaces including $L^q$-spaces with $1<q \neq 2<+\infty$.

entry.title: Solution of a problem of Peller concerning similarity
entry.summary: We answer a question of Peller by showing that for any c>1 there exists a power-bounded operator T on a Hilbert space with the property that any operator S similar to T satisfies $\sup_n\|S^n\|>c.$

entry.title: On the complemented subspaces of the Schreier spaces
entry.summary: It is shown that the Schreier space X admits a set of continuum cardinality whose elements are mutually incomparable complemented subspaces spanned by subsequences of the natural Schauder basis of X.

entry.title: Subspaces of c_0 and Lipschitz isomorphisms
entry.summary: We show that the class of subspaces of c_0 is stable under Lipschitz isomorphisms. The main corollary is that any Banach space which is Lipschitz isomorphic to c_0 is linearly isomorphic to c_0.

entry.title: Szlenk indices and uniform homeomorphisms
entry.summary: We prove some rather precise renorming theorems for Banach spaces with Szlenk index $\omega_0$. We use these theorems to show the invariance of certain quantitative Szlenk-type indices under uniform homeomorphisms.

entry.title: Slices in the unit ball of a uniform algebra
entry.summary: We show that every nonvoid relatively weakly open subset, in particular every slice, of the unit ball of an infinite-dimensional uniform algebra has diameter~2.

entry.title: Orthogonal harmonic analysis and scaling of fractal measures
entry.summary: We show that certain iteration systems lead to fractal measures admitting exact orthogonal harmonic analysis.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: C. R. Acad. Sci. Paris Ser. I Math. 326 (1998), 301--306

entry.title: Surjective factorization of holomorphic mappings
entry.summary: We characterize the holomorphic mappings $f$ between complex Banach spaces that may be written in the form $f=T\circ g$, where $g$ is another holomorphic mapping and $T$ belongs to a closed surjective operator ideal.

entry.title: On the Dunford-Pettis Property of the Tensor product of C(K) spaces
entry.summary: We characterize those compact Hausdorff spaces K such that the proyective tensor product of C(K) by itself has the Dunford-Pettis Property, answering thus in the negative a question posed by Castillo and Gonzalez.

entry.title: Compact range property and operators on $C^*$-algebras
entry.summary: We prove that a Banach space $E$ has the compact range property (CRP) if and only if for any given $C^*$-algebra $\cal A$, every absolutely summing operator from $\cal A$ into $E$ is compact.

entry.title: Dual Banach spaces which contain an isometric copy of $L_1$
entry.summary: A Banach space contains asymptotically isometric copies of $\ell_1$ if and only if its dual space contains an isometric copy of $L_1$.

entry.title: Obstacles problems with measure data
entry.summary: We give a definition for Obstacle Problems with measure data and general obstacles. For such problems we prove existence and uniqueness of solutions and consistency with the classical theory of Variational Inequalities. Continuous dependence with respect to data is discussed.

entry.title: From slightly coloured noises to unitless product systems
entry.summary: Stationary Gaussian generalized random processes having slowly decreasing spectral densities give rise to product systems in the sense of William Arveson (basically, continuous tensor product systems of Hilbert spaces). A continuum of nonisomorphic unitless product systems is produced, answering a question of Arveson.

entry.title: A Conditional Quasi-greedy Basis of l_1
entry.summary: We show that the Lindenstrauss basic sequence in l_1 may be used to construct a conditional quasi-greedy basis of l_1, thus answering a question of Wojtaszczyk. We further show that the sequence of coefficient functionals for this basis is not quasi-greedy.

entry.title: Classifying characteristic functions giving Weyl-Heisenberg frames
entry.summary: We examine the question of which characteristic functions yield Weyl-Heisenberg frames for various values of the parameters. We also give numerous applications of frames of characteristic functions to the general case (g,a,b).

entry.title: H^1 n'a pas de base complètement inconditionnelle
entry.summary: Let H^1 be the classical Hardy space of analytic functions on the unit disc. We show that this space does not admit any finite rank completely unconditional decomposition of the identity.

entry.title: Some characterizations of the automorphisms of $B(H)$ and $C(X)$
entry.summary: We present some nonlinear characterizations of the automorphisms of the operator algebra $B(H)$ and the function algebra $C(X)$ by means of their spectrum preserving properties.
entry.arxiv:comment: 11 pages. To appear in Proc. Amer. Math. Soc

entry.title: A note on noncommutative interpolation
entry.summary: In this paper we formulate and solve Nevanlinna-Pick and Carath\'eodory type problems for tensor algebras with data given on the N-dimensional operator unit ball of a Hilbert space. We develop an approach based on the displacement structure theory.

entry.title: The principle of local reflexivity for operator ideals and its implications
entry.summary: We present a survey of past research activities and current results in constructing a mathematical framework describing the principle of local reflexivity for operator ideals and reveal further applications involving operator ideal products consisting of operators which factor through a Hilbert space.

entry.title: A Banach space with a symmetric basis which is of weak cotype 2 but not of cotype 2
entry.summary: We prove that the symmetric convexified Tsirelson space is of weak cotype 2 but not of cotype 2

entry.title: A note on the integral representation of functionals in the space SBD(O)
entry.summary: In this paper we study the integral representation in the space SBD(O) of special functions with bounded deformation of some L^1-norm lower semicontinuous functionals invariant with respect to rigid motions.

entry.title: Automatic continuity of biseparating maps
entry.summary: We prove that a biseparating map between spaces of vector-valued continuous functions is usually automatically continuous. However, we also discuss special cases when it is not true.

entry.title: Yet another inverse function theorem
entry.summary: We prove a Nash-Moser type inverse function theorem in Frechet spaces for functions with approximate inverses, allowing for a loss of derivatives proportional to $n$ in the way of Lojasiewicz and Zehnder.

entry.title: The Structure of Inner Multipliers on Spaces with Complete Nevanlinna Pick Kernels
entry.summary: We establish some multivariate generalizations of the Beurling-Lax-Halmos theorem.

entry.title: Density Invariance of Certain Operational Quantities of Bounded Linear Operators in Normed Spaces
entry.summary: Based on ideas of R.W. Cross, a simplified proof is presented of the density invariance of certain operational quantities associated with bounded linear operators in normed vector spaces.

entry.title: Common hypercyclic vectors for multiples of backward shift
entry.summary: We prove that the space $l^2$ contains a dense set of vectors which are hypercyclic simultaneously for all multiples of the backward shift operator by constants of absolute value greater than 1.

entry.title: Nonsurjective nearisometries of Banach spaces
entry.summary: We obtain sharp approximation results for into nearisometries between Lp spaces and nearisometries into a Hilbert space. Our main theorem is the optimal approximation result for nearsurjective nearisometries between general Banach spaces.

entry.title: Extensions of Weak-Type Multipliers
entry.summary: In this paper we prove that if $\Lambda\in M_p(\mathbb R^N)$ and has compact support then $\Lambda$ is a weak summability kernel for $1<p<\infty$, where $M_p(\mathbb R^N)$ is the space of multipliers of $L^p(\mathbb R^N)$.

entry.title: An amenable, radical Banach algebra
entry.summary: We give an example of an amenable, radical Banach algebra, relying on results from non-abelian harmonic analysis due to H. Leptin, D. Poguntke and J. Boidol.
entry.arxiv:comment: 8 pages; the manuscript has been in circulation since 1996

entry.title: Contractive projections in Orlicz sequence spaces
entry.summary: We characterize norm one complemented subspaces of Orlicz sequence spaces $\ell_M$ equipped with either Luxemburg or Orlicz norm, provided that the Orlicz function $M$ is sufficiently smooth and sufficiently different from the square function. This paper concentrates on the more difficult real case, the complex case follows from previously known results.
